mapper.select: SELECT EZ.EXAMZONEID -- 고사장 ID , EZ.EXAMZONENAME -- 고사장명 , EZ.LOCAL -- 지역 , EZ.LOCALDETAIL -- 구 , EZ.LOCALCENTERID -- 지역센터 ID , LC.LOCALCENTERNAME -- 지역센터명 , ((SELECT TOTALUSERCNT FROM YS_EXAMZONE WHERE EXAMZONEID = EZ.EXAMZONEID) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YS_RECEIPT WHERE EXAMZONEID = EZ.EXAMZONEID AND ISCANCEL = 'N' AND EXAMID = #{examId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )) AS LEFTOVERSEAT -- 잔여좌석 , EZ.EXAMZONEMAP -- 약도 FROM YS_EXAMZONE EZ INNER JOIN YS_EXAMANDEXAMZONEREL EZR ON EZR.EXAMZONEID = EZ.EXAMZONEID LEFT JOIN YS_LOCALCENTER LC ON EZ.LOCALCENTERID = LC.LOCALCENTERID WHERE 1 = 1 AND EZR.EXAMID = #{examId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EZ.LOCALDETAIL = #{examZoneDetail, jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT DISTINCT EZ.LOCALDETAIL FROM YS_EXAMZONE EZ INNER JOIN YS_EXAMANDEXAMZONEREL EZR ON EZR.EXAMZONEID = EZ.EXAMZONEID WHERE EZR.EXAMID = #{examId};
